name: Tea Run
description:
Move around the tea garden while carrying tea to serve customers who want that kind of tea.

Move north, west, south, and east by tapping WASD, IJKL, or arrow keys, or by clicking the arrow keys on the screen. Pick up tea at any of the counters where tea has brewed to deliver it to all interested customers at tables that you pass.

You are a server represented by a lavender square; when carrying tea, the color of tea is shown as well. Counters are maroon squares at the far north, west, south, and east sides of the tea garden; if a counter has tea ready to serve, its color will also be shown.

(Inspired by Trijam #156 and made in three hours; I intend to update this game further in the future.)
